*Horoscope Matching* : Kundli Matching (Ashtakoota Guna Milap or 36 Points Match)
*Horoscope Matching* : Kundli Matching (Ashtakoota Guna Milap or 36 Points Match)

* Lal Kitab: Lal Kitab Kundli, Varsha Kundli, Prediction for planet in each house, Remedies, kundli type like dharmi teva, andha teva, ratandh teva etc. and Debts.
* Varshphal: Chart, Planets and Varshphal Prediction.

* Lal Kitab: Lal Kitab Kundli, Varsha Kundli, Prediction for planet in each house, Remedies, kundli type like dharmi teva, andha teva, ratandh teva etc. and Debts.
* Varshphal: Chart, Planets and Varshphal Prediction.

- Updated for horoscope 2019
- Bug fixes

* Support for AstroSage Cloud - share charts across devices and platforms. Backup your charts on Cloud.
* Calculations for Astrologer - Shadbala, Prastarashtakvarga, Bhav Madhya, Friendship, Avkahada chakra, Ghatak & much more
* Download PDF & Print Kundli (birth chart)
* New Reports Added - Baby Names, Moon Sign, Moon Classical
* Download PDF for Horoscope Matching (36 Points Match)
